section.name: Introduction
section.p: This plugin, based on ESIGate API, generate a set of HTML pages with reusable components.

ul.li: Pages in folder src/main/resources/pages can use aggregator syntax in order to include template or block
Modules in folder src/main/resources/modules are the template and block to reuse

section.name: Generate project with archetype
section.p:
The simplest way is to generate your project with the archetype :
mvn archetype:generate -DarchetypeRepository=http://smile-sa.github.com/maven-repository/releases -DarchetypeGroupId=org.fast.archetype -DarchetypeArtifactId=fast-archetype

section.name: Configuring the plugin in an existing project
section.p: You can also add this plugin to an existing project.
Add this plugin to the pom.xml :
And add ESIGate repository as plugin repository

Create the following directory structure
|--src/main/resources/ |-- modules/ |-- pages/
